DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Disturbed sleep (anxiety)
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was stressed and I could not stop thinking. Will those worries ever end?

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about an invisible monster
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: There was an unseen creature in my bed with me, gnawing on my limbs. It seemed to enjoy itself, nibbling on every bone with endless patience. I did not feel pain, but I could hear the crunching and tearing of my body. Eventually, it ate all of me, and I was gone.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about getting cooked
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was lying, cramped, in a small metal box with a big window. Something clicked and whirred, and the lights came on. It got hotter and hotter, and I realized I was lying in an oven! The heat rose and rose, until I woke up.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about withering away
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I was a flower in a beautiful, green grassland. When the sun came up, I bloomed and stretched my petals. First, the warmth felt wonderful, but then it began to burn. The grassland around me turned brown and hard until only I was left.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Disturbed sleep (starvation)
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: My growling stomach kept me awake...

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about solitary confinement
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I dreamt of all my friends leaving me, one by one. In the end, it was only me, locked in this dark hole, forever.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about servitude
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: There was stone tablet hovering just above me, inscribed with the endless, demeaning tasks ahead of me and with the big plans my masters have. It didn't feel like those plans included me.

DreamersDream.DreamDef.label: Dreamt about hierarchy
DreamersDream.DreamDef.description: I sat on a golden throne, eating a delicious meal. People worked around me. When I was done eating, I called to them and they turned. All of them had my face!
